articles.title: I Will Sell Nigerian Refineries To Businessmen If Elected; They Can Manage Them Better – PDP Presidential Candidate, Atiku - SaharaReporters.com
articles.description: The presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar, has again vowed to sell Nigerian refineries to “businessmen” if he is elected in 2023. Atiku stated this during a special interview with the Voice of America (VOA Hausa) during …
articles.content:
The presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar, has again vowed to sell Nigerian refineries to businessmen if he is elected in 2023.

articles.title: Osun gov-elect, Davido, others bag Afro awards - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: The Osun State Governor-Elect, Senator Ademola Adeleke, his nephew and singer David Adeleke, popularly known as Davido and legendary African drummer, Chief Tajudeen Amoo-Adeleke, are among Africans and Americans to be honoured at the Afro Award 2022 in Los An…
articles.content:
This was contained in a statement issued by Founder and Executive Producer of  Afro Awards, Mr. Taiwo Oduala,.
